text: Eghtɨ ian tav uaghan, bizir Godɨn damazimɨn mɨzezir tamɨn suiragham, ka ti asɨzir zuezir puvatɨzitam, o bizir mɨzegha gumazamizibar mɨkarzibar itiba, o asɨzir mɨzɨrɨzir kɨ aghuaziba, dar suiragh, egh gumazir kam gɨn ofan asɨzir tuzir kam ameghtɨ, me a batueghtɨ a Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn gumazamizibar ikɨzimɨn ikian kogham.”
